DataElement.preferredName: Specimen Elapsed Time Surgical Procedure Clamping Fixative Ind-3
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator that asks whether the fixation was performed within a specified amount of time after the surgical clamp of blood supply.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Specimen Elapsed Time Surgical Procedure Clamping Fixative
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the elapsed time (the interval between two reference points in time) from a surgical clamping procedure (a diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by fastening or gripping with a clamp) and the fixative used to preserve a tissue specimen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredName: Elapsed Time Surgical Procedure Clamping Fixative
Property.preferredDefinition: The interval between two reference points in time.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.:To fasten, grip, or support with or as if with a clamp.:Agents employed in the preparation of histologic or pathologic specimens for the purpose of maintaining the existing form and structure of all of the constituent elements.

Concepts.definition: The interval between two reference points in time.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
To fasten, grip, or support with or as if with a clamp.
A compound that preserves tissues and cells for microscopic study.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Was the fixation performed wi
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the fixation performed within 20 minutes of the surgical clamp of blood supply

DataElement.origin: SWOG CRF:Southwest Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Labs Ind-3 (2181324v1) with VD Yes No Unknown Indicator (3506034v1) - dbw
